attributes.action: Ban foreign donations to political parties
attributes.background: Since 2010 the Conservatives have received £3 million in Russian donations. Foreign investment in political parties is undemocratic. The UK should outlaw foreign donations to political parties.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are unsure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. In particular, we are not sure what you mean by "foreign donations".

There are already rules about the types of donations that can be accepted by political parties. You can find out more on page 4 of this document:

http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/__data/assets/pdf_file/0014/102263/to-donations-rp.pdf

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the change you would like to see to these rules.
